name: Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes Map Pack
name_original: Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes Map Pack
description:
Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes Map Pack is a strategy game developed by Stardock Entertainment. It came out on 20-06-2013. It was published by Stardock Entertainment.
Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes Map Pack is available on PC.
